meanings.definition: A thin, crisp Indian bread made from lentil flour.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat pappadum with my curry.
meanings.sent2: The pappadum was crunchy and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The pappadum danced in the hot oil as it cooked.
meanings.sent4: The pappadum was as thin as a whisper.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pappadum filled the room, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: To cook or heat up a pappadum.
meanings.sent1: Can you pappadum the bread for me, please?
meanings.sent2: I will pappadum the pappadum before serving.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally pappadumed the pappadum too long, and it burned.
meanings.sent4: She pappadumed the pappadum with such care, it turned out perfect.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly pappadumed the pappadum to perfection.
